content.p: https://forms.office.com/e/8t4MVYeeHS Running a business definitely requires money; but have you got a plan for where to get it from and what the consequences are of those decisions? Join this Roundtable with Laura to understand a bit more about what a capital strategy is, how to think about raising funds, and anything else you might need to know. Jubilee Campus Nottingham NG8 1BB Email: ingenuitylab@nottingham.ac.uk
